Name: Sevara
description:
Sevara was born in 1987. She is married and has 3 children, who are non-adults. Sevara is a very hardworking woman and she tries to provide a good living standard for her children.

For 9 years Sevara has been busy with animal husbandry and growing crops. She feeds cattle and sells them in a local market. She has regular customers at the market, thanks to the good condition of her animals.

Sevara is asking for a loan of 3,800 TJS to buy coal and wood to keep her house warm in the winter season. She awaits your mercy.
